spdx.licenseText:
Copyright <year> <copyright holder>

Permission to use, copy, modify, distribute, and sell this
documentation for any purpose is hereby granted without fee,
provided that the above copyright notice and this permission
notice appear in all copies. <copyright holder>
makes no representations about the suitability for any purpose
of the information in this document. This documentation
is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.
spdx.standardLicenseTemplate:
<<var;name="copyright";original="Copyright <year> <copyright holder>  ";match=".{0,5000}">>
Permission to use, copy, modify, distribute, and sell this documentation for any purpose is hereby granted without fee, provided that the above copyright notice and this permission notice appear in all copies. <<var;name="copyrightHolder1";original="<copyright holder>";match=".*">> makes no representations about the suitability for any purpose of the information in this document. This documentation is provided "as is" without express or implied warranty.
spdx.name: Historical Permission Notice and Disclaimer - documentation sell variant
spdx.licenseComments: This is very similar to HPND-sell-variant but it is for documentation and alters the notice obligation.
